scripts.build: npm run html:build && npm run js:build && npm run data:build && npm run css:build && npm run download:build
scripts.data:build: mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/data resources/img dist/resources/
scripts.js:build: mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/js resources/vendor dist/resources/
scripts.html:build: export IFS=','; mkdir -p dist; htmlpages=$(npm run html:pages --silent); for f in $htmlpages; do echo $f && php-cgi -q ${f}.php > dist/${f}.html && mkdir -p dist/${f} && cp -f dist/${f}.html dist/${f}/index.html; done;
scripts.css:build: node-sass -o resources/css/ resources/scss/screen.scss --include-path node_modules/compass-mixins/lib/ --output-style expanded --source-comments && mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/fonts resources/css dist/resources/
scripts.deploy:fli:redirects: set -ex; for f in *.php; do touch dist/$f && aws s3 cp dist/$f s3://climate-explorer/ --website-redirect "/${f%.php}/"; done;
scripts.deploy:nemac:redirects: set -ex; for f in $(npm run html:pages); do touch dist/$f && aws s3 cp dist/$f s3://climateexplorer2.nemac.org --website-redirect "/$f.php/"; done;
